alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:05PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall in northern Wayne, southern Oakland and southern Macomb Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 603 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall along a line extending from near St. Clair Shores to near Novi. Storm movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall. Winds near 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall is capable of street flooding. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warren, Livonia, Troy, Southfield, St. Clair Shores, Pontiac, Novi, Mount Clemens, Grosse Pointe, Downtown Detroit, Detroit, Sterling Heights, Dearborn, Royal Oak, Birmingham, Northville, Clinton, Detroit Zoo, Belle Isle and West Bloomfield. People attending Comerica Park should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
